Mustex: That's what everyone else said about it. You
say that as if you don't lose at least a fews in
basketball. Besides what fun is it if you don't get to
see a little blood on the ice after fights or in your
case the ring.

OOC: Not that the rest of this and several past post
weren't OOCs in disquis. Can we stop pretending not to
argue about sports and disquising it in posts. Let's
get back to the game.
